Notes on OpenXP 3.70

OpenXP 3.70 is beta. Some features of other versions have been disabled since they have not been ported yet.

Advances of this version?

  • Dos,Win,OS/2 and Linux/FreeBSD port
  • by using 32 bit some limitations are gone

Be aware:

  • With Win9x/ME the win32 version runs very slow since terminal support of these windows versions is bad. Use OpenXP dos instead. But, on WinNT/2000 the win32 version is much faster than the dos version.
  • BBS support has been disabled except for FidoNet. The fido mailer does currently not work under win32. Use the dos version instead. Charge calculation does not work.

This version will provide in future:

  • Usage of remote modems via TCP

You can also have a look at the
